text: Viridoturris is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turridae, the turrids. ==Species== Species within the genus Viridoturris include: * Viridoturris corona (Laseron, 1954){{WRMS species|435217|Viridoturris corona ==References== Category:Turridae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Viridoturris
